did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.origination: Virginia Daughters of the American Revolution

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Miscellaneous Genealogical Notes Collection No. 25. Accession 52841. Genealogical notes collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Virginia Daughters of the American Revolution.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes Bible records, cemetery records, deeds and wills for the following localities: Accomack, Augusta, Fairfax, Henrico, Nelson, Russell, Scott, and Washington Counties, and Charlottesville, Hampton, Lynchburg, Newport News, and Richmond, Virginia; and Massachusetts, New York, and Tennessee. Families included are: Abney, Adams, Booth, Drummond, Dull, Farrar, Jenney, Kiser, Megeach, Phillips, Rittenhouse, Roberts, Roe, Sinckler, Spurr, and Yates. Each item is catalogued individually.

did.unittitle: Wills of Adams, Booth, Jenney, Megeach, Roberts, Sinckler, Spurr, Yates, Loudoun County, Virginia, 1758-1761
